page.title: 19SUPERNATURAL
page.content: When Beadnell Hall was a hotel sightings of a ghost was reported by guests to the staff. The Grey Lady appears every 10 years looking for her jewels. Late one night Fred a chauffeur saw the figure of a fair haired lady in a long grey dress come out of a garden beside the Church & float through the wall into the church-yard. Lady has a pitcher of water over her shoulder,one guest found top drawer of chest full of water. Another time footsteps were heard going up into attic,no one was there but dogs hair bristled and stood on end. The Towers Hotel-A couple were staying in Room 1,an apparition appeared silhouetted against the wall,other guests had a feeling of being watched when staying in that room.
